title: Best New York Cheesecake
ingredients: ['150g digestive biscuits, crushed into fine crumbs', '4 tablespoons finely chopped walnuts', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '115g unsalted butter, melted', '3 eggs', '450g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '750ml soured cream']
